mapper.select: SELECT no, dong, aptname, dealamount,buildyear,dealyear,dealmonth,dealday,area,floor,jibun FROM housedeal ORDER BY no DESC
SELECT no, dong, aptname, buildyear, jibun, lat, lng FROM houseinfo ORDER BY no DESC

SELECT no, dong, aptname, dealamount,buildyear,dealyear,dealmonth,dealday,area,floor,jibun FROM housedeal WHERE dong LIKE '%${dong}%' AND aptname LIKE '%${aptname}%' and CAST(dealamount AS signed integer) between #{dealamount_start} and #{dealamount_end} ORDER BY no DESC
